verses.verse: Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Assign <S%H5414>you<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4733>refuge<s%>, whereof I <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto you <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>,

that the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> and <S%H7684>unawares<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4733>thither<s%>: and they shall be unto you for a refuge from the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of those <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H1696>declare<s%> his <S%H1697>cause<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%>; and they shall <S%H622>take<s%> him into the <S%H5892>city<s%> unto <S%H5414>them<s%>, and give him a <S%H4725>place<s%>, that he may dwell among <S%H3427>them<s%>.

And if the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5462>him<s%>, then they shall not deliver up the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>; because he <S%H5221>smote<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>unawares<s%>, and <S%H8130>hated<s%> him not <S%H8543>beforetime<s%>.

And he shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H5892>city<s%>, until he <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, until the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall be in those <S%H3117>days<s%>: then shall the <S%H7523>manslayer<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> unto his own <S%H5892>city<s%>, and unto his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, unto the <S%H5892>city<s%> from whence he <S%H5127>fled<s%>.

And they set <S%H6942>apart<s%> <S%H6943>Kedesh<s%> in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H7153>Kiriath-arba<s%> (the same is <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>) in the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, they <S%H5414>assigned<s%> <S%H1221>Bezer<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> in the <S%H4334>plain<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, and <S%H7216>Ramoth<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>, and <S%H1474>Golan<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> out of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

These were the <S%H4152>appointed<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H5221>them<s%>, that whosoever killeth any <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H7684>unwittingly<s%> might <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H4191>thither<s%>, and not die by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, until he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.
